name: api_scene_SceneManager
description: Manage scenes in the Player and in Play mode in the Editor.

properties.name: CreateScene
properties.description: Create an empty new Scene at runtime with the given name.

properties.name: GetSceneAt
properties.description: Gets the scene at the specified index in the SceneManager's scene list. This includes scenes that ar

properties.name: GetSceneByBuildIndex
properties.description: Get a Scene struct from a build index.

properties.name: GetSceneByName
properties.description: Searches through the Scenes loaded for a Scene with the given name.

properties.name: GetSceneByPath
properties.description: Searches all Scenes loaded for a Scene that has the given asset path.

properties.name: LoadScene
properties.description: Loads the Scene by its name or index in Build Settings.

properties.name: LoadSceneAsync
properties.description: Loads the Scene asynchronously in the background.

properties.name: MergeScenes
properties.description: This will merge the source Scene into the destinationScene.

properties.name: MoveGameObjectsToScene
properties.description: Move multiple GameObjects, represented by a NativeArray of instance IDs, from their current Scene to

properties.name: MoveGameObjectToScene
properties.description: Move a GameObject from its current Scene to a new Scene.

properties.name: SetActiveScene
properties.description: Set the Scene to be active.

properties.name: UnloadSceneAsync
properties.description: Destroys all GameObjects associated with the given Scene and removes the Scene from the SceneManager

properties.name: activeSceneChanged
properties.description: Subscribe to this event to get notified when the active Scene has changed.

properties.name: sceneLoaded
properties.description: Assign a custom callback to this event to get notifications when a Scene has loaded.

properties.name: sceneUnloaded
properties.description: Add a delegate to this to get notifications when a Scene has unloaded.
